name: The Curse of New Orleans
description:
Description

Escape the haunted hotel in this spooky adventure game.

I was one of the programmers that worked on this. I must admit, that it's not featured prominently on my Itch page for a reason. Due to a lack of testing, the game turned out too hard and confusing. If you want to play anyways, I recommend following the walk through that is included in the zip file.

I designed and implemented the final chase sequence.
